review_title: Not what it used to be
pros: Quarterly bonuses after a year of working there

job_title: Certified Medical Assistant (CMA) in Ridgecrest, CA
pros: Pros: Bonuses, Set Schedule, Multiple Locations
cons: Management is awful, pay is very low considering other employers and positions within the same areas, management is not qualified in clinical operations. Managers tend to be administrative without nursing or medical assistant background, unable to move up, Omni will not support your desire to attend school and further your education.

job_title: Director of Communications in Bakersfield, CA
pros: Omni Family Health offers excellent benefits, competitive salaries, and bonuses. Omni has strong leadership and financial stability with opportunities for career growth.
cons: The organization is growing faster than new staff and providers can be brought on.

pros: Caring leadership. Clear directions given my management. Supports growth.
cons: The company is slow to open positions when gaps in coverage exist

pros: It was a great place to grow in your profession.

cons: Wasn’t with the company long enough to have any cons.

job_title: Physician Assistant in Green Valley, AZ

pros: HR helps employees with their rights, career goals and concerns.

job_title: Registered Dental Assistant in Bakersfield, CA
cons: Traveling from an office to others

pros: Pay, benefit and offices are good.  Some locations are new, others are very beat up and worn.  They are renovating.
cons:
Politics is the guiding principle in this organization.  From the CEO down, it is not what you know or your abilities to perform, it is very much who you know.  Senior leadership will use politics to get what they want and if your ideas are not in line with their agenda they will stop it or use politics to kill it.  Senior leadership micromanages more than at any other company I worked before.

We had parties every year, but they were designed to adore senior leadership, especially the CEO.

Worst work experience ever - not recommended at all.

review_title: Is truly an equal opportunity employer in every sense of the word.
job_title: Human Resources Generalist in Bakersfield, CA
pros: The supervisors/hiring managers work just as hard as their subordinates and really care about the company, employees and patients. Good benefits. Growing.
cons: I have no cons at this moment. Therefore, I really don't have anything of value to add to this category.

cons: there is no cons for this company love it

pros: Good pay, great benefits, fast paced environment
